name: Neo's adventure - Alpha Version
description:
Controls:

  1. Start: Enter
  2. Select: Shift
  3. A: X, J
  4. B: Z, Control
  5. Arrow Keys

Made using GB Studio

The game is an Alpha, it’s unfinished, it’s still under development and many things can change.

Please, if you have any recommendation, tell it me i’ll appreciate it.

The beds and tables of the some house are from: https://jan-schneider.itch.io/mansion-interior-assets-pack
